aphid_high_humidity.description: High humidity + NDVI drop indicates aphid infestation risk
aphid_high_humidity.recommendation: Spray neem oil (2%) early morning. Inspect underside of leaves.

bollworm_risk_flowering.description: NDVI drop + flowering stage indicates bollworm risk (cotton only)
bollworm_risk_flowering.recommendation: Inspect flowers for larvae. Apply recommended pesticide if infestation confirmed.

whitefly_temp_humidity.description: High temp + moderate humidity increases whitefly risk
whitefly_temp_humidity.recommendation: Use yellow sticky traps. Monitor underside of leaves.

rice_bph_high_humidity.description: High humidity increases Brown Planthopper (BPH) risk in rice

significant_ndvi_change.description: Large NDVI change means crop stress (pest or weather-related)
significant_ndvi_change.recommendation: Investigate field for pests, nutrient deficiency, or irrigation issues.
